required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Calculation of Normal MUNIX Variation in an Healthy Population

brief_summary.textblock:
Motor unit number index (MUNIX) is an electrophysiological technique that estimates the number of motor units in a muscle. This data can be changed by natural evolution or by treatment in peripheral neuropathy. Alfortunately, normal value for MUNIX variation does not exist. Thus, it is difficult to assume improvement or worsening of the MUNIX for an individual subject.
Our objective is to calculate normal variation of MUNIX in 4 muscles : tibialis anterior, abductor digiti mini, abductor pollicis brevis et deltoideus. Measurement will be performed at inclusion and 3 monthes later in 100 healthy subjects. This trial will be prospective in several French centres sepecialized in neuromuscular evaluation

detailed_description.textblock:
Motor unit number index (MUNIX) is an electrophysiological technique that estimates the number of motor units in a muscle. This data can be changed by natural evolution or by treatment in peripheral neuropathy. Alfortunately, normal value for MUNIX variation does not exist. Thus, it is difficult to assume improvement or worsening of the MUNIX for an individual subject.
Our objective is to calculate normal variation of MUNIX in 4 muscles: tibialis anterior, abductor digiti mini, abductor pollicis brevis et deltoideus. Measurement will be performed at inclusion and 3 monthes later in 100 healthy subjects. This trial will be prospective in several French centres sepecialized in neuromuscular evaluation

primary_outcome.description: motor unit number inedx in 4 muscles: tibialis anterior, abductor digiti mini, abductor pollicis brevis et deltoideus

arm_group.description: healthy subjects MUNIX will be performed

intervention.description: Motor unit number index in 4 muscles: tibialis anterior, abductor digiti mini, abductor pollicis brevis et deltoideus

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy subjects without neuromuscular disoreders or others diseases which can interfer with MUNIX measurement
- More than 18 years old
Exclusion Criteria:
- Less than 18 years old
- Diseases which can interfer with MUNIX measurement

facility.name: Assistance Publique Des Hopitaux de Marseille
